document.full_text: gwen stefani donated $1,000,000 on wednesday to save the children's japan earthquake-tsunami children in emergency fund to help in the relief and recovery effort.
document.title: gwen stefani donates $1 million for japan relief
lines_and_colors: gwen stefani donated $1,000,000 on wednesday to save the children's japan earthquake-tsunami children in emergency fund to help in the relief and recovery effort.
